name: CatalogInfo
description:
Retrieves information about the Square Catalog API, such as batch size
limits that can be used by the `BatchUpsertCatalogObjects` endpoint.

$ul: **errors**: Any errors that occurred during the request.
**batch_delete_max_object_ids**: The maximum number of object IDs that may be included in a single
**batch_retrieve_max_object_ids**: The maximum number of object IDs that may appear in a `/v2/catalog/batch-retrieve`
**batch_upsert_max_objects_per_batch**: The maximum number of objects that may appear within a single batch in a
**batch_upsert_max_total_objects**: The maximum number of objects that may appear across all batches in a
**search_max_page_limit**: The maximum number of results that may be returned in a page of a
**update_item_modifier_lists_max_item_ids**: The maximum number of item IDs that may be included in a single
**update_item_modifier_lists_max_modifier_lists_to_disable**: The maximum number of modifier list IDs to be disabled that may be included in
**update_item_modifier_lists_max_modifier_lists_to_enable**: The maximum number of modifier list IDs to be enabled that may be included in
**update_item_taxes_max_item_ids**: The maximum number of item IDs that may be included in a single
**update_item_taxes_max_taxes_to_disable**: The maximum number of tax IDs to be disabled that may be included in a single
**update_item_taxes_max_taxes_to_enable**: The maximum number of tax IDs to be enabled that may be included in a single
**standard_unit_descriptions**: List of standard (non-custom) measurement units in this description group.
